article: Mrs . White comes from America . She is an English teacher in No . 12 High School of Guangzhou . She speaks Chinese a little and often has Chinese classes . She likes here very much . She often says the Chinese people are very nice . She is Lucy and Lily ' s mom . Lucy and Lily live in America with their dad , Mr . White . They are students . They have some Chinese pen pals . , .

model: no , but a little , but a little .
